headline.main: VICHY IS COMBATING WIDE RESISTANCE; All Public Offices Are Said to Harbor Enemies of Regime Who Block 'Salvation' 2 NEWSPAPERS PUNISHED 25 More City Governments Are Ousted Because of Opposition to Retain's Rule

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Nov. 12 -- Some passive resistance to the Vichy Government continues, according to an article in the Royalist newspaper, Action Francaise, which predicts that the movement will be stamped out.
abstract: Action Francaise predicts passive resistance to Vichy Govt will be wiped out; 25 munic govt officials ousted
snippet: VICHY, France, Nov. 12 -- Some passive resistance to the Vichy Government continues, according to an article in the Royalist newspaper, Action Francaise, which predicts that the movement will be stamped out....

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
